overview: After a powerful crime boss gets his most valuable possesion stolen, he employs a young cowboy bounty hunter called Tex to find and bring back Hunted, the boy who stole his diamond egg in search for water. Tex, motivated by his own scores to settle, goes on his journey to find the boy but is unaware another hunter shares the same goal as him to collect Hunted's capture reward. As Tex goes along in his mission he must face decisions of revenge or forgiveness, battling foes and even himself... in this approach of a more modern era of a western.
title: The Forgiven
